basics.name: Steve Lam
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: Front-End Developer with 10 years of experience in an agency environment, creating and maintaining responsive web applications for major brands. Proficient in modern web technologies and proven ability to adapt to self-starting and collaborative environments.

work.summary: Developed various multi-language major brand sites in a team environment while adapting to the rapidly changing front-end tech landscape.
work.name: Rethink
highlights: Helped rebuild existing architecture for A&W sites using modern web practices and testing for AODA compliance.
Increased response time and site speed by 30% utilizing various practices (code-splitting / storage db caching / bundle optimization)
Maintained site with weekly updates with accompanying Eblast development with React Mail and testing with Litmus.
Complete documentation (Prerequisites / Configuration details / Installation tutorial / API info / potential troubleshooting)
Oversaw and delegated design tasks to interns for the design and development of Molson Canadian #ThisIsLive music site platform.

Building and maintaining Molson Coors sites (Molson Canadian, Molson 67, Coors Light, Creemore Springs, Rickards) utilizing a variety of tooling / CMSâ€™s (Sitecore, Wordpress, Drupal, Grunt, Gulp, Webpack)

work.summary: Redesigned the Humber Student Federation website and developed from wireframe / layout to deployment of production site.
work.name: Humber College
highlights: Developed custom Wordpress theme utilizing Bootstrap framework and Sass for responsive design.
Optimized with Yoast for site functionality and SEO / accessibility.
Suggested and implemented SQL backup functionality.
